author: terence0083
content: Hi <@532654603238375425> my team is interseted to test out bloXroute relay on some Goerli validators. May I ask how to generate the hex key as documented here? https://docs.google.com/document/d/17JrY4pK_ftqg8C9cxn7Rk8vByvQjAVPB4z0cAJGUQL0/edit

author: jgm
content: You don't need to generate a different key, you can just use that URL directly.

author: terence0083
content: Gotcha. Do you know the purpose of the key? I understand for testnet, it maybe ok to share, but I'd love to understand the real implication for security comes mainnet
